Host Artists activGuard Web Site Security
Host Artists activeGuard will protect and secure your web hosting automatically. No configuration is required and no files have to be uploaded. InnoHosting activeGuard runs on the server level and is non-intrusive. It continuously monitors your web site, protects against online threats and defends against intrusion attempts. Utilizing real-time visitor behavior analysis and 'Just In Time' virtual application patching, activeGuard ensures your web applications are fully protected and equipped with the latest security technologies to fend off the common threats faced today. Make exploited WordPress, Joomla and other applications a thing of the past with activGuard Security.

24/7 Ticket Support!
Instant Setup

For the full specs of our host packages see:
https://www.hostartists.com/

Our servers are housed in UK (Maidenhead) at state of the art data centres with full power and network redundancy. We use only premium bandwidth carriers, carefully chosen to give the most efficient response times and routes to the rest of the world. No matter where your visitors are based, one thing you can be sure of - your websites will load quickly and reliably.

Powerful Servers + stable platform = Rock Solid Service
We use 24 (HT) core CPU's, 32GB RAM and a RAID10 storage configuration. Servers are underloaded and under utilised to ensure when your site needs more power, it's available. This in combination with CloudLinux ensures the servers can handle sudden load spikes gracefully. Bottom line, you receive a solid, predictable and stable service. HTTP is further accelerated with the powerful webserver, Nginx - giving your websites a significant boost in performance and page load times.

Don't see a package that fits your needs? Than let us build you your own customized package! Contact us at www.hostartists.com for details!
